languages.text: "Соломон может и ушел, но его порядки останутся. Ничего не менять, служить на износ, понял?"
"Solomorne may be gone but his rules still stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"
languages.original_text: "Соломон может и ушел, но его порядки останутся. Ничего не менять, служить на износ, понял?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne may be gone but his rules stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"
"Solomorne may be gone but his rules stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"
"Solomorne may be gone but his rules still stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"
"Solomorne may be gone but his rules still stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"
"Solomorne may be gone but his rules still stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"
"Solomorne may be gone but his rules still stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"

languages.text: 「ソロモーンはもういないが、その規律はいまだに生きている。何ひとつ変えるな。身体が動く限り仕えよ。分かったか？」
languages.original_text: "Solomorne may be gone but his rules still stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーンはもういないが、その規律はいまだに生きている。何ひとつ変えるな。身体が動く限り仕えよ。分かったか？」

languages.text: «Solomorne ya no está, pero sus reglas siguen vigentes. No cambie nada. Trabaje hasta que sus fuerzas se agoten por completo. ¿Me explico?».
languages.original_text: "Solomorne may be gone but his rules still stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: «Solomorne ya no está, pero sus reglas siguen vigentes. No cambie nada. Trabaje hasta que sus fuerzas se agoten por completo. ¿Me explico?».

languages.text: « Solomorne n'est peut-être plus parmi nous, mais ses règles valent toujours. Ne changez rien. Continuez à servir jusqu'à l'épuisement. Est-ce bien clair ? »
languages.original_text: "Solomorne may be gone but his rules still stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: « Solomorne n'est peut-être plus parmi nous, mais ses règles valent toujours. Ne changez rien. Continuez à servir jusqu'à l'épuisement. Est-ce bien clair ? »

languages.text: “索罗蒙虽然走了，但他定下来的规矩依然有效，一个字都不准改。认真侍奉王朝，直到最后一刻为止，听懂了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Solomorne may be gone but his rules still stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: “索罗蒙虽然走了，但他定下来的规矩依然有效，一个字都不准改。认真侍奉王朝，直到最后一刻为止，听懂了吗？”

languages.text: "Solomorne mag weg sein, aber seine Regeln haben Bestand. Verändert nichts. Dient, bis der Dienst Euch verzehrt. Ist das klar?"
languages.original_text: "Solomorne may be gone but his rules still stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne mag weg sein, aber seine Regeln haben Bestand. Verändert nichts. Dient, bis der Dienst Euch verzehrt. Ist das klar?"

languages.text: "Solomorne ölmüş olabilir ama kanunları baki. Hiçbir şey değişmeyecek. Hizmet edemeyecek hâle gelene dek hizmet edeceksin. Anlaşıldı mı?"
languages.original_text: "Solomorne may be gone but his rules still stand. Do not change a thing. Serve until service wears you down. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne ölmüş olabilir ama kanunları baki. Hiçbir şey değişmeyecek. Hizmet edemeyecek hâle gelene dek hizmet edeceksin. Anlaşıldı mı?"
